summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Bible API integration, search functionality, user profile features, and expanded devotionals/dictionary. Backend APIs are fully functional with real Bible verse content from World English Bible, 365 devotionals, and 30+ dictionary terms including prophecy-related terms. Frontend displays correctly with some minor integration issues identified.

integration_issues.issue: John 3:16 displays content from John 1:16 in frontend, but backend API returns correct verse

passed_tests: Bible API returns real verse text from World English Bible
John 3:16 API endpoint returns correct 'For God so loved the world' content
Bible chapter API shows 'World English Bible' translation
Bible search endpoint /api/bible/search/verses works with 5+ results
Search result structure includes reference, text, book, chapter, verse fields
Profile API returns user stats (bookmarks, journals, forum_posts)
Profile API returns settings (notification_email, notification_forum, preferred_translation, theme_preference)
Profile update endpoint accepts name and settings changes
Reading progress API returns books_started, total_books (66), chapters_bookmarked, progress_percentage
Devotional API returns 365 total devotionals for full year
Today's devotional includes day_of_year calculation
Bible dictionary has exactly 30 terms (requirement met)
Dictionary includes new prophecy terms: rapture, tribulation, millennium
Dictionary entries include Hebrew and Greek origins
All dictionary endpoints (get, search, individual word lookup) working
Bible page loads with real verse content (Genesis 1:1 confirmed)
Bible page displays World English Bible translation
Bible navigation between books and chapters works
Bible search dialog opens and submits queries
Bible search returns results in frontend
User authentication and premium status verification works
All backend endpoints return 100% success rate (67/67 tests passed)
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor frontend issue: John 3:16 displays wrong verse content in UI (shows John 1:16 instead). Backend API returns correct verse, so this is a frontend display mapping issue. All other features working correctly.

success_percentage.backend: 100% (67/67 tests passed - all new features working)
success_percentage.frontend: 95% (minor verse display issue in John 3:16, all other features working)
